articles.title: Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Industrial Establishments
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il Provides Field Guidance to Industrial Establishments
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il provided field guidance to the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex and the Ranam Coal Mining Machine Complex.
					The first leg of his guidance was the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex.
					
					He acquainted himself in detail with technological updating and construction and production at the complex, going round its different places including the newly installed large oxygen plant.
					
					He highly appreciated the achievements made by the workers of the complex, expressing great satisfaction over the fact that they have successfully completed the vast reconstruction project by their own efforts and satisfactorily settled difficult technological matters including the introduction of a new method to the heating process with their own technology.
					
					He said that the achievements made by the complex in the recent period are the fruition of the implementation of the slogan of "Self-reliance is the only way out!" in all aspects of their work and life, adding that the experience of the complex is a convincing proof of the great vitality of the revolutionary spirit of self-reliance created by President Kim Il Sung in the crucible of the cutting wind in Mt. Paektu.
					
					Saying that the complex is playing an important role in building a great prosperous and powerful nation, he put forward the tasks to be carried out by the complex.
					
					The workers of the complex represent the heroic working class who created the tradition of loyalty, supporting the Party with iron, bearing deep in mind the teachings of the President "Iron and the machine are the king of industry!", he said, calling upon them to live and struggle with the same spirit and stamina as they displayed in building socialism from scratch after the war.
					
					He stressed that the most important task facing the complex is to thoroughly establish the iron production system relying on locally available raw materials.
					
					It is necessary to give fullest play to the production capacity already created by the complex and, at the same time, steadily increase its production capacity by continuing to push forward technological updating in order to satisfactorily meet the ever-growing need for iron and steel, he said.
					
					He expressed expectation and conviction that the workers of the complex would bring a new turn in the production of iron and steel through a devoted drive and thus creditably discharge their honorable mission and duty as a hardcore unit in building a great prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					The next leg of his guidance was the Ranam Coal Mining Machine Complex.
					
					Going round the machines newly manufactured on the basis of the latest technology and technologically-updated processes, he learned in detail about the progress made in the modernization of the complex and its production.
					
					He highly appreciated the successes made by its workers, expressing his great satisfaction over the fact that they are successfully carrying out the work to put the complex on a modern and scientific basis through a brisk mass technical innovation movement.
					
					Noting that the complex is rapidly turning out machinery requiring high technology by closely combining science and technology with production and working out bold and big operations and carrying them out in a persevering manner to cement its material and technical foundations, he highly appreciated the mental power and tirelessly creative energies displayed by its officials, workers and technicians in steadily creating everything advanced in Korean style.
					
					It deserves a high praise that the officials, workers and technicians of the complex jointly explored a new area for modernization and scientification by their own efforts and technology, he said, adding: This signal achievement goes to clearly prove the true advantages of our society where the rights of the working people are fully guaranteed and their wisdom and creative ability displayed to the full and the validity and tremendous vitality of the WPK's idea of giving importance to science.
					
					The heroic workers of the DPRK are the fighters who devotedly carry out any difficult task in time with the faith that they can do anything unconditionally when the party is determined to do, he said, stressing that a great prosperous and powerful nation is sure to be built as there are large contingents of such faithful workers.
					
					He set forth important tasks to be carried out by the complex, expressing deep trust that its workers would realize its modernization and scientification at a higher level on the basis of the successes already made.
					
					It is an important task facing the complex to closely combine the work for keeping the production going at a high rate with modernization in reliance upon the advantageous socialist planned economy and push ahead with them and thus break the record in production and improve the quality of machinery, he noted, indicating the orientation and ways to do so.
					
					He was accompanied by Hong Sok Hyong, chief secretary of the North Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the WPK, Pak Nam Gi, department director of the WPK Central Committee, and Ju Kyu Chang and Ri Jae Il, first vice department directors of the WPK Central Committee.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Vituperation against DPRK's Dignity and System Rebuked
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Vituperation against DPRK's Dignity and System Rebuked
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued a statement on Feb. 21 denouncing traitor Lee Myung Bak for malignantly slandering the dignity and system in the DPRK. He, when dining and wining at "Chongwadae" recently, jabbered that "it would be better not to build socialism if people had to worry about three meals a day under it."
					Branding the remarks of the traitor as unpardonable outbursts fully disclosing his true colors as an anti-reunification element persistently standing against national concord and reunification and inciting hostility toward fellow countrymen and confrontation with them, the statement continued:
					
					Lee has nothing but a temperament of a fraudulent dealer accustomed to hoodwinking others. It is an intolerable insult and a mockery of the people in the DPRK for such guy to say this or that about dignified socialism in the DPRK with the theory which can be spelled only by those physical and mental cripples leading a corrupt material life. 
					
					It is south Korea that is beset with the issues of poverty and human rights.
					
					The south Korean society is plagued with unprecedented unemployment and poverty due to economic bankruptcy and destitution of people's livelihood. And even women with baby carriages, middle school students and children took to the streets demanding the right to existence protesting against the Lee group which has sold off the economic market of south Korea to outsiders lock, stock and barrel though it is directly related not only to the livelihood of the people but to their lives. This is the true picture of south Korea at present.
					
					There occurred recently a tragic incident in Ryongsan in which those people who were in the mire of poverty before being dishoused by the Lee group were burned to death by the fascist hooligans hurled by traitor Lee. This has sparked off a great public furor.
					
					It is quite preposterous for the worst traitor who turned south Korea into a veritable hell and graveyard of human rights to dare let loose sheer sophism to slander someone. This is ridiculous enough to make even a cat to laugh.
					
					Lee's utterances will get him nowhere as they are no more than mean and shameless sophism aimed to justify the policy of confrontation with the DPRK, a policy censured and rejected at home and abroad, and incite the hostility toward fellow countrymen among south Koreans.
					
					His recent reckless remarks made it clearer that it is impossible to expect the peace and reunification of the country, to say nothing of the improvement of the inter-Korean relations as long as this anti-reunification element and traitor, steeped in the hysteria for confrontation with fellow countrymen to the marrow of his bones, is allowed to stay in power in south Korea.
					
					Now that the traitor is coming out to blatantly challenge the DPRK, slandering even the mainstay of its servicepersons and people, far from drawing a lesson from his treacherous act of having pushed the north-south relations to the worst phase, the DPRK will certainly settle accounts with the group of traitors through the most merciless and resolute measure.
					
					 The days ahead will prove in practice what a miserable end the Lee group of traitors will meet.

articles.title: Greetings to PM of Saint Lucia
articles.content:
Greetings to PM of Saint Lucia
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Il, premier of the DPRK, sent a message of greetings to John George Melvin Compton, Prime Minister of the Saint Lucia, on Saturday on the occasion of the 30th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message wished the prime minister success in his work for prosperity of the country and well-being of the people.

articles.title: Title of Honorary Professor to Kim Jong Il from Ecuador
articles.content:
Title of Honorary Professor to Kim Jong Il from Ecuador
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with the title of honorary professor by the Maharishi College of Technology of Ecuador on the occasion of his birthday. 
					A ceremony of conveying the certificate of the title took place at the college on Feb. 12.
					
					Present there were Alba Chavez, director of the International Institute of the Juche Idea and vice-chairwoman of the Latin American and Caribbean Regional Committee to Support the Reunification of Korea, and Jenny Moran Cardenas, rector of the college, and others, and members of the DPRK group for cooperation in Koryo medicine active in the country. 
					
					The certificate was handed to the head of the group at the ceremony.
					
					Written on the certificate of the title of honorary professor are letters "The Maharishi College of Technology of Ecuador has the honor to present the title of honorary professor to the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il who has made a great contribution to humankind by inheriting and developing the Juche idea. The Council of the Maharishi College of Technology of Ecuador. Guayaquil, February 12, 2009."

articles.title: Indian Ambassador Celebrates Birthday of Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Indian Ambassador Celebrates Birthday of Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Indian Ambassador to the DPRK Zile Singh gave a reception on Friday to celebrate the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					 Present there on invitation were Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, Kim Yong Jin, minister of Education, Kim Thae Jong, vice department director of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yong Il, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, Paek Yong Ho, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and officials concerned.
					
					 Staff members of the Indian embassy were on hand.
					
					Zile Singh in his speech at the reception said that India and the DPRK briskly conducted exchange of visits in various fields, adding that the two countries have closely supported each other in international arenas.
					
					The Indian government hopes that the DPRK would become a stronger and more prosperous country in 2012 and wishes peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula, he noted.
					
					Yang Hyong Sop stated in his speech that the birth of Kim Jong Il as the bright star of Mt. Paektu was a great auspicious event of the nation that promised the brilliant future of the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					Hoping that the Indian people would achieve greater success in their work for the independent development and prosperity of the country, he said that the DPRK would strive to develop the friendly and cooperative relations with India in various fields.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Russian Organization
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Russian Organization
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from the Russian Federation of International Charity Organizations "World of Goodwill" on the occasion of his birthday.
					Oleg Oleinik, president of the federation, handed the gift to the DPRK ambassador to Russia on Feb. 16.

articles.title: Flower Festival Reflecting Best Wishes of Mankind
articles.content:
Flower Festival Reflecting Best Wishes of Mankind
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The 13th Kimjongilia Festival had been held with splendor at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition in Pyongyang from February 14 to 20 on the occasion of the February 16, the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il, which is an auspicious holiday common to the humankind.
					Ri Yong Je, a department director of the Korean Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee, said in an interview with KCNA:
					
					The flower festival is an annual event. But this year's festival was a grand one of the Sun's flower and of praise for the great man, which reflected the boundless respect and best wishes of the Korean people for Kim Jong Il who kindled the torch of a new great revolutionary upsurge in the country and is covering constantly the road of on-the-spot guidance day and night from the outset of the year.
					
					Tens of thousands of potted Kimjongilias cultivated with care by more than 90 units including the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, organs of the People's Armed Forces, the State Academy of Sciences, the Ministry of Posts and Telecommunications, the Mansudae Art Studio and officers and men of the Korean People's Army, working people from all strata and school youth and children had been displayed at the festival. It glaringly showed the firm resolution of all the servicepersons and the entire people of Korea to follow their leader to the last.
					
					Hundreds of potted Kimjongilias exhibited by the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, Ri Hwa Son, the manager of the Jian city branch office of the General Association of Korean Residents in China and her son Han Chol Ho and other overseas Koreans made the festival more beautiful.
					
					Lots of immortal flowers carrying the infinite reverence of the world progressive humankind for the peerlessly great man were also displayed there in the name of diplomatic missions and international organizations here, friendship and solidarity organizations, tourist companies of various countries and individual figures.
					
					 During the festival the number of visitors from Korea and abroad amounted to over 250,000.
					
					 Visitors said that Kimjongilia is unique, incomparably beautiful and famous flower and is the king of flowers in the world, adding that the immortal flower named after the great man rare to be seen will come into fuller bloom all over the world.

articles.title: Overseas Koreans Leave
articles.content:
Overseas Koreans Leave
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- A congratulatory group of the General Association of Koreans in China led by Vice-Chairman Cha Sang Bo, a congratulatory group of the International United Confederation of Koreans led by Sok Song, first vice-chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia, a congratulatory group of the Federation of Koreans in the U.S. headed by its Secretary General Kim Hyon Hwan, a congratulatory group of the Federation of Koreans in New Zealand led by its Secretary General Kim Hong Gun, a delegation of officials of Kumgang Insurance Company of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) led by Kim Hyon Il, and an art troupe of Koreans in Japan for celebrating February 16 led by Ri Ryong Su, head of the Kumgang-san Opera Troupe of Chongryon, left Pyongyang today.

articles.title: Reception Marks Anniversary of DPRK-China Agreement
articles.content:
Reception Marks Anniversary of DPRK-China Agreement
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries and the Ministry of Culture of the DPRK hosted a reception at the Chongryu Restaurant Friday to mark the 50th anniversary of the signing of the agreement on cultural cooperation between the governments of the DPRK and China.
					Present there on invitation were Liu Xiaoming, Chinese ambassador to the DPRK, and staff members of his embassy here.
					
					Mun Jae Chol, acting chairman of the above-said committee, Han Chol, vice-minister of Culture, Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the committee, and officials concerned were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made at the reception.

articles.title: Reception Given by Russian Diplomats
articles.content:
Reception Given by Russian Diplomats
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Ambassador Valery Sukhinin and Military Attache Alexei Bartusov of the Russian embassy here hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on Feb. 20 on the occasion of the "Day of the Defenders of Motherland."
					Present there on invitation were Pak Jae Gyong, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, generals and other officers of the Korean People's Army, officials concerned and diplomatic envoys and military attaches of various embassies here.
					
					 Staff members of the Russian embassy were on hand.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Collection of Writings Published
articles.content:
Collection of Writings Published
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- "May the Country of General Kim Jong Il Shine" (8), a collection of students' writings, was printed by the Educational Books Publishing House.
					Contained in the book were at least 300 pieces of writings composed by 88 students.
					
					Among them are nursery rime "Home of the Sun" and "The General Is Identical to the Generalissimo" and lyric "Image of Mother" telling that the prospering DPRK demonstrates itself as the country of the sun and the country of people where its people are blessed with the illustrious leaders through generations as they have held in high esteem the three commanders of Mt. Paektu and where the talents of rising generations are being cultivated and they are being provided with happiness.
					
					Lyric "The Memorable Path to the Tabaksol (shrub pine trees) Military Post", nursery rime "As Indicated by the General" and other works stress that thanks to the Songun leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il opening up the rosy future, the DPRK will shine forever as the country of
						Kim Jong Il, which is strong in ideology and military power and is prospering through great surge and leap.
					
					 There are also experience writings "Glow of Kangson and Literary Group" and writers' comments on works.

articles.title: Swampy Resources under Protection
articles.content:
Swampy Resources under Protection
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Korea is rich in swampy resources as it faces seas on three sides and has many rivers and streams, natural and artificial lakes and reservoirs.
					The swampy land is precious resource needed for protecting and propagating biodiversity on the earth.
					
					According to the data released by the Natural Conservation Union of Korea, the swampy land is a good habitat for animals and plants, migratory and water birds in particular. More than one million water birds fly into Korea to winter, out of which the birds of longbills genera reach to over 700,000.
					
					The government has decided as reserves ten-odd swampy areas on the eastern and western coasts including Mundok, South Phyongan Province, and Kumya, South Hamgyong Province, and is directing greater efforts to protecting and managing them.
					
					In particular, marshes, ponds, rivers, lakes and seashores where the depth of water is below six meters in ebb-tide were included in swampy lands. Activities are being down for the survey and study of swampy ecosystem, establishment, protection and management of swampy reserves and for rational use of swampy resources.
					
					The government strictly bans hunting and illegal economic development and directs primary attention to protecting and managing the animals living in swampy reserves.
					
					The work for protecting swampy resources begins in the DPRK from February every year.

articles.title: Moves to Tighten U.S.-South Korea Military Nexus Flayed
articles.content:
Moves to Tighten U.S.-South Korea Military Nexus Flayed
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The United States is talking about "strengthened posture of military counter-action" while steadily amassing aggressor forces in south Korea and Japan and other areas around the Korean Peninsula.  The commander of the U.S. forces in south Korea, in a recent lecture, let loose bellicose remarks that the U.S. and south Korean forces are closely following the "north's attitude" and they are getting ready to jointly counter any "provocation from the north." 
					Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					The U.S. bellicose forces' assertion about "rounding off the posture of combined counter-action" and "tightening U.S.-south Korea alliance" reveals their intention to stifle the DPRK by force of arms and maintain and strengthen its military edge in the Asia-Pacific region. 
					
					What is noteworthy in the U.S. recent attitude is that it is busy setting up the U.S.-south Korea "combined air force command" and the "combined reconnaissance group" and working out a new joint military "operation plan" to replace the "OPLAN 5027." This indicates that the U.S. is making desperate efforts to tighten the military siege to the DPRK and stifle the DPRK by force of arms.
					
					The moves of the U.S. and south Korea to tighten their military nexus betray the design of the U.S. bellicose forces to drive the south Korean puppets to perpetrating military provocations against the DPRK and launch a new all-out war on the Korean Peninsula under that pretext.
					
					The moves to create the above-said mechanisms are intended to get the U.S. forces and the south Korean puppet forces ready for the war and round off the joint military operational capability. They are also designed to hold a military edge in the Asia-Pacific region. 
					
					If the U.S. war-thirsty forces are allowed to continue frantically stepping up the moves for another Korean war in pursuit of the reinforced military edge in that region, the situation on the Korean Peninsula will reach an unpredictable phase and the U.S. will be held wholly accountable for the ensuing consequences. 
					
					The U.S. warlike forces would be well advised to face up to the trend of the situation and stop their reckless military moves against peace.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak Group's Human Rights Abuses Blasted
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak Group's Human Rights Abuses Blasted
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The treacherous policy pursued by the Lee Myung Bak group is a harsh policy of abusing human rights as it drives the majority of the working people to death, letting them die like flies, to ensure its "ruling security" and meet the interests of a handful of the privileged.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					The recent murder of evacuees in Ryongsan was a shuddering tragedy, a result of the unpopular policy of abusing human rights pursued by the group of traitors.
					
					The Lee group is more vociferous about "human rights" than its predecessors. But the reality clearly proves that the human rights abuses committed by the group put the past military fascist hooligans into the shade.
					
					The group is setting the puppet prosecution and conservative media in motion to hide the crime it committed by burning innocent evacuees to death and shamelessly pass the buck for the tragedy to the victims in a bid to mislead the public opinion. It has gone the lengths of perpetrating again such fascist atrocity as hurling its repressive force into indiscriminately cracking down upon the protesters against the murder.
					
					South Korea has turned into a graveyard of democracy and human rights and a dark fascist society rare to be found in the world.
					
					Unpardonable are the above-said crimes the Lee group has committed against humanity in the first year of its office by pursuing a fascist dictatorial policy of ruthlessly quelling the desire and wishes of the people for democracy and rights.
					
					It is proven in reality that neither human rights nor democratic freedom are thinkable under Lee's dictatorial rule.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Criminal Theory of Confrontation with DPRK Assailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Criminal Theory of Confrontation with DPRK Assailed
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The theory of "adherence to principle" as regards the inter-Korean relations touted by traitor Lee Myung Bak recently whenever an opportunity presented itself is a version of the theory of maintaining confrontation with the DPRK, says Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a signed commentary.
					It goes on: 
					
					No sooner had the traitor come to power than sought the criminal purpose of bringing the north-south relations to stalemate. Hence he has cried out for "adhering" to the treacherous and anti-reunification "principle" while denying the principle of independent reunification, a basis for the development of the inter-Korean relations. 
					
					Lee Myung Bak is the worst traitor who stakes his fate on division and confrontation as he has thrown a stumbling block in the way of reunification and worked hard to provoke a war of aggression against the DPRK after pushing the north-south relations to the worst crisis in a bid to prolong his dirty remaining days.
					
					What merits a serious attention is that the traitor seeks to push the north-south relations to the brink of a war under the pretext of "adherence to principle."
					
					The traitor is escalating military tension, talking about "emergency" and the theory of "preemptive attack". It has become clearer that the group does not have even the slightest intention to drop the hostility toward the DPRK but seeks to stand in confrontation with the DPRK for an indefinite period and, furthermore, ignite a war under the signboard of "adherence to principle".
					
					Lee is a wicked, ignorant and reckless traitor, a confrontational fanatic putting the successive dictators into the shade and a dangerous element bringing disaster to the nation.
					
					It is the tragedy of history that such human scum of the times as Lee is allowed to stay in power to do harm to the destiny of the nation.
					
					 The traitor's theory of "adherence to principle" sounds as no more than a dirge.

articles.title: S. Korean Philistine's Anti-DPRK Malarkey Rebuked
articles.content:
S. Korean Philistine's Anti-DPRK Malarkey Rebuked
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Ri Ki Thaek, chief vice-chairman of the "advisory council for democracy, peace and unification" of south Korea, in his recent "itinerant lecture," talked nonsense, when referring to the totally frozen inter-Korean relations. He blustered that the north is leading the relations to the extreme phase of confrontation and the "policy of co-existence and co-prosperity" is a "pragmatic policy" calling for co-existing with each other while preserving peace.
					Minju Joson Saturday observes in a signed commentary in this regard:
					
					Ri let loose a spate of invectives slandering fellow countrymen and justifying south Korea's "policy toward the north." This was a sheer falsification of truth.
					
					By nature, Ri Ki Thaek is a philistine with whom one can not communicate.
					
					At the end of last year he talked rubbish about the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula, ignorant of its essence. So the DPRK advised him to study it with honesty.
					
					This advice was made not because it was unaware of the fact that he is treated as a "seasonal politician" and "human scum" even in the south Korean political circle, but because it took into consideration the fact that he once involved himself to a certain extent in the reunification movement calling for democracy against dictatorship. Had he had an iota of reason, he should have behaved with discretion, feeling thankful for the advice. But he is now responding to our advice with outbursts calling for "unification through absorption" and "itinerant lecture" inciting confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					There is no knowing how such despicable act would please Lee Myung Bak but what is clear is that Ri will never be able to escape stern punishment by the nation for such behavior. The DPRK keeps strict tabs on all the crimes such riff-raffs as Ri committed by staging the anti-DPRK confrontational farce called "itinerant lecture."
					
					The philistines such as Ri Ki Thaek will face a stern judgment by the nation if they further bedevil the inter-Korean relations by letting loose outbursts falsifying truth through similar lectures. They would be well advised to behave themselves, though belatedly, as regret will not mend matters.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak's Move to Institute Evil Law on Media Assailed
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak's Move to Institute Evil Law on Media Assailed
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- South Korean media persons made public a declaration on the situation on Feb. 16 denouncing the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors' move to institute an evil law on media.
					The declaration accused the Lee regime and the "Grand National Party" of seeking to railroad the "bill on amendment to the law on broadcasting services", evil bill on media, etc. through the "extraordinary session of the National Assembly" in February.
					
					It held that in case these evil bills are carried, conservative newspapers such as Chosun Ilbo, Choongang Ilbo and Dong-A Ilbo and big businesses will monopolize even the broadcasting services and the media will be under their complete control.
					
					It also charged that the "bill on revision of the law on newspapers" aimed at serving the conservative newspapers is to meet the interests of the "government" and the ruling party in the final analysis.
					
					It urged the Lee "government" and the GNP to immediately halt the move to use the media as a tool for those in power.
					
					It expressed the will of the media persons to join all other people in the struggle for checking the railroading of the evil bill on media by the Lee "government" and the GNP.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Authorities' Move to Cover up Tragedy in Ryongsan under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Authorities' Move to Cover up Tragedy in Ryongsan under Fire
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The People's Council for Livelihood and Democracy in south Korea called a press conference in Seoul on Feb. 16 at which it denounced the puppet authorities for their sinister action to hide the truth about the killing of evacuees in Ryongsan.
					Speakers at the press conference said that they were just stunned to learn that "Chongwadae" recently issued an instruction to the police to prod media into giving wide coverage to the "chain murder cases" that occurred in Kunpho, Kyonggi Province in a bid to calm down the public criticism of the tragic incident in Ryongsan.
					
					This is a mockery of the victims and their bereaved families and a farce to quell the people's anger triggered off by the prosecution's announcement of the hypocritical results of its investigation into the tragic incident and divert the public attention elsewhere, they said.
					
					They accused the present "government" of adamantly denying its red herring and spread of lies, though they were brought to light.
					
					A press release read out at the press conference urged "Chongwadae" to disclose its act of misleading the public opinion and severely punish those responsible for it.
					
					It stressed that the probe into the truth about the killing of evacuees in Ryongsan can no longer be left to the prosecution and police as they are nothing but tools for those in power.

articles.title: Puppet Warmongers Accused of Inciting War and Confrontation
articles.content:
Puppet Warmongers Accused of Inciting War and Confrontation
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Progress of south Korea held a press conference outside the building of the puppet Ministry of National Defense on Feb. 18 to condemn warmongers for inciting war and confrontation.
					Speakers at the press conference chided Ri Sang Hui, minister of "National Defense," for blustering at the "National Assembly" recently that he would "deploy more powerful forces in the waters where the northern limit line runs".
					
					The outbursts let loose by him openly agitating an armed conflict against the backdrop of the escalating tension between the south and the north are as reckless as adding fuel to the flames, they stressed, and went on:
					
					The October 4 declaration adopted between the south and the north clearly lays down peace proposals for preventing accidental clashes in the West Sea. Nevertheless, the military authorities are only crying out for confrontation, ignoring it.
					
					Recalling that on the same day the military authorities announced that they would stage Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises together with the United States, they strongly demanded an immediate stop to such reckless moves for war and confrontation.
					
					They declared that they would stage a fiercer struggle against the south Korea-U.S. joint military exercises throughout south Korea.

articles.title: Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassies in Various Countries
articles.content:
Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassies in Various Countries
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- On the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary
					Kim Jong Il, the Commission for External Affairs of the Central Committee of the Communist Party, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, the Ministry of Defence, the Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development, the Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism, the Department of International Cooperation of the Ministry of Public Security, the Union of Friendship Organizations, the Ho Chi Minh Communist Youth Union, the Women's Union, the People's Committee of Hai Duong Province, the Ho Chi Minh Museum of Vietnam, the Vietnam-DPRK Friendship Association, the Ministry of Information and Culture of Laos, the People's Party of Cambodia, the FUNCINPEC Party, the Khmer Democratic Party, the Ministry of Foreign Affairs and International Cooperation, the Secretariat of the Prime Minister, the Taekwon-Do Association of Cambodia, the Foreign Ministry of Myanmar, the youth organization of the Malaysia Chinese Association, the Kuwaiti preparatory committee for commemorating February 16, the Kuwait-DPRK Friendship Association, the Workers' Party, the People's Socialist Party, the Socialist Popular Party of Mexico, the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism, the Mexican Institute for the Study of the Juche Idea, the Mexican Fellowship Institute to Honor the Memory of President Kim Il Sung, the Mexican Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification, the Mexico-Korea Friendship Association and the Chinese embassy in Switzerland sent floral baskets to the DPRK embassies in the relevant countries from Feb. 11 to 17.
					Those who sent floral baskets to the DPRK embassies in their countries from Feb. 11 to 16 included the vice-prime minister and minister of Defence, the vice-prime minister and foreign minister of Laos, the secretary of the Central Committee of Lao People's Revolutionary Youth Union, the vice-minister of Industry and Commerce of Vietnam, the chairman of the Vietnam-Korea Friendship Parliamentary Group, the deputy general secretary and the regional deputy secretary of Syria's Baath Arab Socialist Party, the chief of the General Staff of the Armed Forces of Syria, the president of the Syrian Trade Unions Federation, the chairwoman of the General Federation of the Syrian Women, the deputy prime minister and minister of Defense of Cambodia, the minister of Information, the minister of State and minister of Commerce of Cambodia, the vice-chairman of the National Democratic Party and the minister of International Cooperation of Egypt, the secretary of the General People's Committee and the national security advisor of Libya, the chairman of the Italian General Investment Group and other personages from all walks of life in various countries.
					
					And the "International Kim Il Sung Fund" and companies of China sent floral baskets to the DPRK consulate general in Hong Kong on Feb. 10 and 14.

articles.title: February Holiday Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
February Holiday Celebrated in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Seminars were held in Cambodia, Pakistan and Bangladesh from Feb. 3 to 10 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					Lu Lay Sreng, first vice-chairman of the FUNCINPEC Party of Cambodia, said that the world progressive people including Cambodia highly praise the Korean people for the great successes made in various fields under the energetic and wise leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					N. D. Khan, minister of Social Welfare of the Sind State Government of Pakistan, noted that the army and people of the DPRK are making vigorous endeavors to open the gate to a great, prosperous and powerful nation in 2012, the centenary of birth of President Kim Il Sung, without fail true to the Songun leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					The minister of Culture and Tourism of the Sind State Government of Pakistan noted that the international community expresses admiration and envy at the shining successes made by the DPRK, adding that these are the fruition of the Songun policy pursued by Kim Jong Il, an outstanding statesman and a peerlessly great man.
					
					The adviser of the Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea, M. Gamrul Huda, its secretary general, and M. Jahangir Khan, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, lauded Kim Jong Il as an outstanding leader not only of the Korean people but of the world progressive people, deeply explaining and proving the validity and vitality of the Songun policy, citing the reality of the DPRK.
					
					 A congratulatory message to Kim Jong Il was adopted at the seminar held by the above-said Bangladeshi institute.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Ukraine
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Birthday Celebrated in Ukraine
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- A meeting was held by the United Confederation of Koreans in Ukraine on February 15 on the occasion of the birthday of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					Kim Yong Sul, chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Ukraine, in a speech at the meeting referred to the fact that all the overseas compatriots are significantly celebrating the birthday of Kim Jong Il.
					
					He noted that Songun Korea is displaying the might of the political and military power as Kim Jong Il paved a wide avenue for building a great prosperous and powerful nation and has led the army and people of the DPRK. 
					
					Though the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors is now frantically kicking up an anti-DPRK racket, it can never hold in check the struggle of the Koreans in the north and the south and overseas to defend and thoroughly implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, he added.

articles.title: Youth Group of Mexican Committee for Study of Kimilsungism Formed
articles.content:
Youth Group of Mexican Committee for Study of Kimilsungism Formed 
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- An inaugural ceremony of the Youth Group of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism was held in Mexico City on February 12.
					On display in the venue of the ceremony were works of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					Ramon Jimenez Lopez, president of the Mexican Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism, in a speech at the ceremony referred to the significance of the formation of the youth group on the occasion of the auspicious February holiday and the brisk activities now under way in different countries to study and disseminate the Juche idea.
					
					He highly appreciated the undying exploits Kim Jong Il has performed by successfully carrying forward the idea and feats of Kim Il Sung under the uplifted banner of Songun and the originality and vitality of the Juche idea, the guiding idea in the era of independence.
					
					 Eleazar Rubio Aldaran who was elected chief of the youth group resolved to fulfill his responsibility and role as an adherent to the Juche idea.

articles.title: Dynamic Struggle to Implement June 15 Joint Declaration Urged
articles.content:
Dynamic Struggle to Implement June 15 Joint Declaration Urged
 Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The European Regional Committee for Implementing the June 15 Joint Declaration held a regular meeting in Germany on February 14 to intensify the struggle for implementing the June 15 joint declaration.
					Speakers at the meeting noted that overseas compatriots should regard it as a keynote of the reunification movement to fully display patriotism even under difficult circumstances.
					
					They stressed the need to steadily conduct the work to help compatriots from all walks of life participate in the struggle for implementing the June 15 joint declaration, foiling the confrontation policy desperately pursued by the south Korean authorities.
					
					A resolution adopted at the meeting referred to the disclosure of the fact that the U.S. financially backed the ultra-right conservative forces of south Korea at a time when the inter-Korean relations have been driven to the worst phase due to the confrontation policy of the Lee Myung Bak group. This is touching off bitter indignation among Koreans, it said, and went on:
					
					Compatriots in Europe desirous of peace and reunification of Korea strongly demand the Lee Myung Bak regime drop its policy opposed to the June 15 joint declaration and opt for national reconciliation and the independent reunification.
					
					 If the Lee Myung Bak regime continues recklessly pursuing confrontation with fellow countrymen, it will not escape judgment of history.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige importantes establecimientos industrials
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige importantes establecimientos industriales
Pyongyang, 21 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno el Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek y el Complejo de Maquinas de Minas de Carbon de Ranam.
					El Dirigente estuvo primero en el Complejo Siderurgico Kim Chaek.
					
					Se cercioro en detalles del estado de renovacion tecnologica, construccion y produccion recorriendo varios lugares del complejo como el separador del oxigeno de gran tamano instalado nuevamente.
					
					Aprecio altamente los exitos alcanzados por los obreros del complejo, muy satisfecho de que ellos terminaron exitosamente con las fuerzas propias la colosal obra de reconstruccion y resolvieron satisfactoriamente con las tecnologias propias los dificiles problemas tecnicos como la introduccion del nuevo metodo del proceso de calentamiento.
					
					Los ultimos exitos del complejo son resultado de la materializacion total en el trabajo y la vida de la consigna "El espiritu de apoyarse en las propias fuerzas es la unica salvacion", apunto.
					
					Prosiguio que las experiencias mostradas por el complejo devienen la prueba contundente de la gran vitalidad del espiritu revolucionario de apoyarse en las propias fuerzas, creado por el Presidente
						Kim Il Sung en medio de vientos y nevascas del monte Paektu.
					
					Indico las tareas que incumben al complejo destacando que este desempena un papel importante en la construccion de una gran potencia prospera.
					
					Los obreros del complejo son los heroicos creadores de la tradicion de fidelidad que vinieron apoyando con acero al Partido acatando con el corazon la instruccion del Presidente "!El hierro y la maquina son los reyes de la industria!", recordo y continuo que ellos deben luchar con aquel espiritu e impetu con que en el periodo posbelico, construian el socialismo sobre las ruinas.
					
					Preciso que la tarea mas importante del complejo es establecer estrictamente el sistema de produccion de hierro basado en las materias primas nacionales.
					
					Senalo que el complejo debe emplear al maximo su capacidad productiva ya preparada y elevarla  constantemente mediante la renovacion tecnologica para satisfacer la creciente demanda de los materiales de hierro y acero.
					
					El Dirigente expreso la esperanza y conviccion de que los obreros del complejo cumpliran perfectamente su honrosa mision y deber como grueso en la construccion de la gran potencia prospera al registrar con sus esfuerzos abnegados un nuevo viraje en la produccion de los materiales de hierro y acero.
					
					Acto seguido, el Dirigente dirigio sobre el terreno el Complejo de Maquinas de Minas de Carbon de Ranam.
					
					Al ver las maquinas fabricadas nuevamente basandose en la tecnica de punta y los procesos reconstruidos tecnicamente, hizo conocimiento en detalles del estado de promocion de la modernizacion y de produccion.
					
					Evaluo altamente los exitos de trabajo de los obreros del complejo mostrandose muy satisfecho de que ellos impulsan magnificamente la modernizacion y la fundamentacion cientifica de su fabrica librando ampliamente el movimiento masivo de innovacion tecnica.
					
					El complejo fabrica a granel las maquinas que requieren altas tecnologias al combinar estrechamente la ciencia y tecnica con la produccion, materializar tenazmente los proyectos ambiciosos y consolidar la base material y tecnica, apunto.
					
					Elogio la potencia espiritual y la inagotable creatividad de los funcionarios, obreros y tecnicos de aqui que crean incesantemente lo avanzado al estilo coreano.
					
					Es muy apreciable que ellos hayan entrado en la nueva etapa de modernizacion y cientifizacion uniendo sus almas, fuerzas y tecnicas, subrayo.
					
					Prosiguio que este exito orgulloso es una muestra directa de la verdadera superioridad de nuestra sociedad, en que son garantizados en todo lo posible los derechos de las masas trabajadoras y se emplean ilimitada inteligencia y creatividad del pueblo, y de la justeza e inagotable vitalidad de la idea de nuestro partido de dar importancia a la ciencia.
					
					Nuestros heroicos obreros son los combatientes de la materializacion absoluta quienes con el credo de "Si el partido decide, lo cumplimos" practican a tiempo cualquier tarea tan dificil, destaco el Dirigente y anadio que es cierta la victoria de la gran potencia prospera por contar con el gran destacamento de tales obreros fieles.
					
					Expreso gran confianza de que los obreros del Complejo cumpliran en un nivel mas alto la modernizacion y la cientifizacion de la fabrica basandose en los exitos alcanzados e indico las tareas programaticas que se presentan ante el Complejo.
					
					La mas importante tarea presentada ante este Complejo es combinar estrechamente la normalizacion de produccion con la modernizacion e impulsarlo con vigor apoyandose en la superioridad de la economia planificada socialista para asi superar el maximo nivel de produccion y elevar la calidad de los articulos de maquinaria, senalo el e indico el rumbo y los medios para el particular.
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario responsable del Comite del PTC en la Provincia de Hamgyong del Norte Hong Sok Hyong, el jefe de departamento del CC del PTC Pak Nam Gi y los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC Ju Kyu Chang y Ri Jae Il.

articles.title: CRPP condena a Lee Myung Bak por difamacion de la RPDC
articles.content:
CRPP condena a Lee Myung Bak por difamacion de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 21 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 21 una declaracion condenando al traidor Lee Myung Bak quien en la reciente orgia en Chongwadae (casa azul) calumnio gravemente la dignidad y el sistema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea diciendo que "es preferible no hacer el socialismo si bajo este sistema hay que preocuparse de como desayunar, almorzar y cenar".
					Esta peroracion imperdonable volvio a revelar la siniestra naturaleza del traidor Lee, elemento anti-reunificacion que se opone obstinadamente a la reconciliacion y la reunificacion de la nacion y persigue solo la hostilidad y enfrentamiento con los connacionales, senala la nota y prosigue:
					
					Al censurar atrevidamente de una u otra manera el muy digno socialismo de la RPDC partiendo de la logica del invalido espiritual y fisico contagiado de la corrupta vida material, Lee Myung Bak, quien lo unico que aprendio fue la mana de estafador de saquear el bolsillo de las personas, insulto y burlo insoportablemente al pueblo de la RPDC.
					
					El problema de pobreza y DDHH si lo hay en el Sur de Corea.
					
					Azotan toda la sociedad surcoreana el desempleo y la pobreza sin precedentes causados por la quiebra de economia y vida popular.
					
					Por otra parte, como consecuencia de la accion traidora de vender a las fuerzas foraneas todo el mercado economico, directamente relacionado con la manutencion y la vida de los habitantes, hasta las mujeres con coches-cunas, los alumnos secundarios y los ninos salen a la calle para protestar y demandar el derecho a la vida.
					
					Recientemente, ocurrio desatando el panico de la gente la "tragedia de los habitantes evacuados de Ryongsan" en que los depauperados habitantes desalojados por la fuerza de su cuna de vida murieron tragicamente quemados por los gangsteres fascistas lanzados por el traidor Lee.
					
					Tal traidor sin igual, que convirtio el Sur de Corea en el infierno y la tumba de DDHH, esta censurando y calumniando al otro con unas sofisterias, lo cual deviene una cosa extremadamente ilogica y ridicula.
					
					Nadie hara caso de la vil e imprudente peroracion del traidor Lee para dar razon a su politica de enfrentamiento con la RPDC rechazada y condenada en el interior y el exterior del pais y fomentar la conciencia hostil a los connacionales entre los habitantes surcoreanos.
					
					A traves del presente caso, se hizo claro que Lee Myung Bak es el traidor anti-reunificacion penetrado del fanatismo por el enfrentamiento fratricida hasta en sus tuetanos y, al dejarlo intacto, no se puede esperar jamas la mejora de las relaciones Norte-Sur ni la paz ni la reunificacion del pais.
					
					Dado que el traidor Lee desafia frontalmente insultando hasta el fundamento de nuestro ejercito y pueblo en vez de sacar lecciones de sus crimenes antinacionales de haber llevado las relaciones Norte-Sur a la peor situacion, ajustaremos la cuenta final con la camarilla del traidor Lee mediante el mas implacable y resuelto balance. 
					
					El tiempo mostrara con hechos cuan tragico sera el fin de la banda de Lee Myung Bak.

articles.title: Premier coreano felicita a su homologo santalucense
articles.content:
Premier coreano felicita a su homologo santalucense
Pyongyang, 21 de febrero (ATCC) -- El premier del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Il, envio este sabado un mensaje de felicitacion a su homologo santalucense, John George Melvin Compton con motivo del 30o aniversario de la independencia de Santa Lucia.
					El remitente desea al destinatario exitos en su labor para la prosperidad del pais y el bienestar del pueblo.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il recibe distincion de profesor honorario del Ecuador
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il recibe distincion de profesor honorario del Ecuador
Pyongyang, 21 de febrero (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il recibio la distincion de profesor honorario que con motivo de su cumpleanos (16 de febrero) le dirigiera el Instituto Tecnico Superior Liceo Maharishi.
					Tuvo lugar el dia 12 en este plantel docente la ceremonia para otorgar el diploma de la distincion de profesor honorario.
					
					En la ocasion estuvieron presentes el director del Instituto Internacional de la Idea Juche y vicepresidente del Comite Latinoamericano  y  del Caribe de Apoyo a la Reunificacion de Corea, Alba Chavez, el rector de este instituto superior, Jenny Moran Cardenas, y los miembros del grupo de cooperantes de medicina Coryo de Corea quienes trabajan en este pais.
					
					 En la ocasion el diploma de distincion de profesor honorario fue entregado al jefe de dichio grupo.
					
					 En el diploma se lee:
					
					"El Instituto Tecnico Superior Liceo Maharishi otorga la presente distincion de profesor honorario al gran Dirigente Kim Jong Il por sus servicios relevantes a la humanidad, por la continuacion de la Idea Juche.
					
					 Dado y firmado por el Honorable Consejo Directivo del Instituto Tecnico Superior Liceo Maharishi. Guayaquil, 12 de Febrero del 2009".

articles.title: Banquete por 50o aniversario de convenio cultural Corea-China
articles.content:
Banquete por 50o aniversario de convenio cultural Corea-China
Pyongyang, 21 de febrero (ATCC) -- Con motivo del 50o aniversario de la suscripcion del convenio sobre la cooperacion cultural entre los gobiernos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Republica Popular China, el Comite Coreano de Relaciones Culturales con el Extranjero (CCRCE) y el Ministerio de Cultura ofrecieron el dia 20 una recepcion en el Restaurante Chongryu.
					A la ocasion fueron invitados el embajador Liu Xiaoming y otros miembros de la embajada china en Corea.
					
					Igualmente, estuvieron presentes el presidente interino del CCRCE, Mun Jae Chol, el viceministro de Cultura, Han Chol, el vicepresidente de la primera entidad, Jon Yong Jin, y otros funcionarios coreanos.
					
					En el banquete hubo discursos.
